title: Designing Biology Learning Strategies Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Core biology theories and research methodology understanding
context.additional_context: A course for advanced professional learners in managerial/leadership roles to strengthen their biology education design competencies.

learning_goals: Analyze the core components of flipped learning (pre-lecture, quizzes, group activities) and design strategies for their application in biology education.
Develop strategies for online discussions and collaborative activities to enhance learner engagement.
Build a framework to measure biology learning effectiveness using project-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
